statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT username, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT customer_id, username FROM customers WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'example1@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, username FROM customers WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890' OR email = 'example2@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM customers WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT username, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN user_sessions ON customers.customer_id = user_sessions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, username FROM customers WHERE username = 'admin' OR username = 'user123';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email NOT LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY expiration_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_time < NOW();
SELECT customer_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_id, sessions.session_id, access_logs.log_id FROM customers INNER JOIN sessions ON customers.customer_id = sessions.customer_id INNER JOIN access_logs ON customers.customer_id = access_logs.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT username, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM account_details WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, username, email, login_time FROM customers JOIN user_sessions ON customers.customer_id = user_sessions.customer_id WHERE login_time > '2025-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, username, account_balance FROM customers JOIN account_details ON customers.customer_id = account_details.customer_id WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(login_time) AS last_login FROM customers JOIN user_sessions ON customers.customer_id = user_sessions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, username, email FROM customers WHERE username LIKE '%johndoe%';
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, session_start FROM sessions ORDER BY session_start DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT username, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT SUM(balance) AS total_balance, COUNT(*) AS total_accounts FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT c.username, s.session_start FROM customers c INNER JOIN sessions s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id ORDER BY s.session_start ASC;
